variable.name: hud_frags_fliptext
variable.description: Toggles alignment of players nick and team name in frags HUD element.

boolean.true: Rows aligned to the right side, names and team tags are on the left side of frag counts.
boolean.false: Rows aligned to the left side, names and team tags are on the right side of frag counts.

variable.remarks: Use 'frags shownames 1' and/or 'frags showteams 1' to show names and team names of players.
